article.title: ATK Awarded Contract to Supply Nonstandard Ammunition for Afghanistan Security Forces
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Alliant Techsystems (ATK) has received an initial $105 million contract award as part of a three-year contract by the U.S. Army Sustainment Command to supply various types of nonstandard (non-NATO) ammunition for the security forces of Afghanistan. If all options are fully exercised, the contract value could potentially exceed $200 million.
